scripts.serve:angular: node scripts/set-env.js && node scripts/set-remote-config-default-env.js && ng serve --host 127.0.0.1
scripts.serve:emulators: node scripts/close-parts-of-firebase-emulator.js && firebase use default && firebase emulators:start
scripts.build:hosting:static: node scripts/set-env.js && node scripts/set-remote-config-default-env.js && ng build --configuration=production && node scripts/index-html-parser.js
scripts.build:hosting:image: cd public && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/remember-me-4/web-site
scripts.deploy:hosting:image: cd public && gcloud run deploy web-site --region=europe-west4 --image gcr.io/remember-me-4/web-site --platform managed
